title: T206 Vic Willis Throwing w/ Old Mill Back 3.5
author: IronHorse2130

posts.post_title: T206 Vic Willis Throwing w/ Old Mill Back 3.5
posts.post_content:
Offering this card for sale because it doesn't fit into my collection.  

T206 Vic Willis Throwing.  Graded 3.5 by GAI.  This was graded by the old GAI.  The back is an Old Mill.  

This card looks beautiful.  There is very minor corner wear and light edge wear.  One tiny stain along the top border on the reverse.  There is a wrinkle that goes from the bottom of the card to the "O" in the word ASSORTMENT.  You can really only see it when you hold it at a certain angle.  I didn't even notice it when I bought it.

Price is $90.00 including US shipping.  Please PM or email me if interested.

[IMG]http://i248.photobucket.com/albums/gg184/IronHorse2130/Baseball%20BST/WillisT2061.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://i248.photobucket.com/albums/gg184/IronHorse2130/Baseball%20BST/WillisT2062.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://i248.photobucket.com/albums/gg184/IronHorse2130/Baseball%20BST/WillisT2063.jpg[/IMG]
Card has been sold.  Thanks to the buyer!
